accordion_grid.headline: Entrepreneurial investing at scale
accordion_grid.description: Millennium seeks to empower talented professionals with the sophisticated expertise, resources and technology to pursue high-quality returns for investors.

list.title: Committed to consistency and stability
list.description: We aim to deliver consistent high-quality returns over the long-term for our investors through a rigorous risk framework, adaptive business model and capital stability.

list.title: Scale and reach
list.description: We believe Millennium’s scale enables us to access global opportunities and leverage the resources and infrastructure to deliver high-quality results.

list.title: Specialization and expertise
list.description: We believe Millennium’s subject-matter expertise helps us continuously evolve, remain nimble and manage risk as we explore new markets, technologies and strategies with discipline and focus.

stats.stat_label: OF EMPLOYEES HOLD AN ADVANCED DEGREE

list.title: Deep investment in technology
list.description: We equip our employees with the latest technology, advanced tools and extensive resources with the goal of making us faster, more resilient and more effective.

quotes.quote: We are differentiated by our scale, level of specialization and entrepreneurial culture. This combination enables Millennium to pursue opportunities and remain nimble.
quotes.name: Ajay Nagpal
quotes.title: President and Chief Operating Officer

text_grid.headline: Investment strategies
text_grid.description: Millennium seeks to pursue a diverse range of investment strategies across industry sectors, asset classes and geographies.

text_blocks.title: Fundamental Equity
text_blocks.description: Conduct fundamental research on companies both as generalists and as specialists within a particular sector or sub-sector.

text_blocks.title: Equity Arbitrage
text_blocks.description: Pursue a range of systematic and fundamental arbitrage strategies across a company’s capital structure and a variety of derivatives.

text_blocks.title: Fixed Income
text_blocks.description: Manage various strategies such as rates, macro, credit, mortgages and asset-backed securities.

text_blocks.title: Commodities
text_blocks.description: Deploy a range of investment strategies across energy, metals, agricultural and soft commodities markets.

text_blocks.title: Quantitative Strategies
text_blocks.description: Build and enhance investment processes that are primarily systematically driven and focused on a variety of asset classes.

slides.title: A culture that powers innovation
slides.description: At Millennium, talented investment teams and technologists work together, balancing the entrepreneurialism of a start-up and the resources of an established enterprise.
slides.attribution:
Steve Gambuzza — Senior Portfolio Manager
Brett Parker — Team Lead, Equity Rapid Application Development

slides.title: Local knowledge, <br class="dt">global impact
slides.description: Millennium has an extensive international footprint. Our teams operate around the world, seeking to turn local insights and diverse perspectives into a globally integrated approach.

text_grid.headline: Rigorous approach to compliance
text_grid.description:
We are focused on effectively navigating our dynamic and multi-jurisdictional regulatory environment. Our professional in-house legal and compliance teams provide control, guidance and oversight.

Nearly a decade ago, we established a Regulatory and Compliance Advisory Council comprised of external industry experts. The council helps us gain a more comprehensive perspective on critical regulatory developments and adapt our policies and procedures in accordance with best practices.

text_blocks.title: Jay Clayton
text_blocks.description: Former Chairman of the SEC, Senior Policy Advisor and Of Counsel to Sullivan & Cromwell and Adjunct Professor, Wharton Business School and Carey Law School, University of Pennsylvania

text_blocks.title: Sir Howard Davies
text_blocks.description: Former Executive Chairman of the UK Financial Services Authority (now Financial Conduct Authority) and former Director of the London School of Economics and Political Science and Non-Executive Chairman of NatWest Group

text_blocks.title: Louis Freeh
text_blocks.description: Former Federal District Court Judge and Former Director of the FBI

text_blocks.title: Joseph Grundfest
text_blocks.description: Former Commissioner of the SEC and Professor at Stanford University School of Law

text_blocks.title: Andre Owens
text_blocks.description: Partner at WilmerHale and former Member of the Counseling and Regulatory Policy Group of the SEC’s Office of General Counsel and former Counsel to SEC Commissioner Steven M. H. Wallman

text_blocks.title: Aulana Peters
text_blocks.description: Former Commissioner of the SEC and retired Partner of Gibson, Dunn & Crutcher
